meanings.sent1: She beshouted at the top of her lungs when she saw the spider.
meanings.sent2: The coach had to beshout to make himself heard over the cheering crowd.
meanings.sent3: The toddler beshouted in delight when she saw the colorful balloons.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm seemed to beshout its fury across the dark sky.
meanings.sent5: His beshouting voice echoed through the empty hallways.

meanings.sent1: The beshout from the angry customer could be heard across the store.
meanings.sent2: His beshout startled the birds from the trees.
meanings.sent3: The beshout of the referee silenced the arguing players.
meanings.sent4: The beshout of the alarm jolted everyone awake.
meanings.sent5: Her beshout of joy filled the room with happiness.
